author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two men died in separate accidents in the city on Monday night. A 70-year-old man, who was riding a motorcycle, died after his vehicle collided with another on the Royapettah High Road flyover around 8 p.m.

Sethu (70)’s motorcycle collided with that of Gautam Anand. He fell off the vehicle and died. Gautam Anand has been arrested.

In another accident, Ponraju (30), a native of Tutucorin, died after he was run over by a lorry in Thiruvanmiyur.

Ponraju was returning home after work when the lorry driven by Veeramani (42) ran over him. Veeramani was arrested.
title: Two die in separate road accidents
